alert.note: Alert for Duval; Inland Nueces; Jim Wells; Live Oak (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 6:17AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Duval, western Nueces, northern Jim Wells and south central Live Oak Counties through 700 AM CDT... At 617 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Annarose, or 17 miles south of George West, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Diego, Orange Grove, Midway, Tecalote, Annarose, Rancho De La Parita, Alfred-South La Paloma, Alfred and Westdale. This includes US Highway 281 between mile markers 640 and 668. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Duval; Inland Nueces; Jim Wells; Live Oak
